category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_export_only_active_shapes
preference.preference_description: Customize the export only active and default shapes setting used during the Load process. This value is modified when the Export Only Active Shapes option in the CATIA (V5) menu is toggled on or off. The default value for this setting is 0. This setting is ignored when Activate Latest Active Shapes option is toggled off. The default value can also be set in Global Preferences (Site or Group Preferences) but the value will always be updated in the User Preferences.
